import React, { useState } from 'react'; import TableItem from "./TableItem"; export default function Table() { let ItemList = ["AMD","NVDA","GOOG","AAPL","MSFT","PYPL","SQ","CGC"]; const [List, UpdateList] = useState(ItemList); return (
{List.map((item,index)=>{ return })}
Symbol Price Open Close Title Status Role
); }
